title: How to Cancel an Unpaid Order on Aliexpress

steps.title: Go to your order details page at https://trade.aliexpress.com/orderList.htm?spm.
steps.content: Go to your order details page at https://trade.aliexpress.com/orderList.htm?spm . If you're not signed in, you'll be prompted to do that in order to see your order history.

steps.title: Click View Detail next to the order you want to cancel.
steps.content: Click View Detail next to the order you want to cancel. You'll see a quick summary of everything included in the order.

steps.title: Click Cancel Order.
steps.content: Click Cancel Order . This will only appear if you have a status of "This order is awaiting your payment." [1] X Research source If prompted, select a reason for the cancellation and click Submit . You may need to contact the seller so they don't accidentally ship the product to you.
